summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.3°C) and outside temperature (down 3.3°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in rainfall (up 0.2 mm) and cloud levels (up 628 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 1578 m), and light levels (up 3793 lux) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, oppressively muggy and sticky and winds will be practically absent. Drizzle or light rain possible, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and some sunny spells will occur. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
